One Level Up Top Level

ocaml/tools/ci/actions/check-labelled-interfaces.sh - ocaml

  1. #!/usr/bin/env bash
  2. #**************************************************************************
  3. #*                                                                        *
  4. #*                                 OCaml                                  *
  5. #*                                                                        *
  6. #*                 David Allsopp, OCaml Labs, Cambridge.                  *
  7. #*                                                                        *
  8. #*   Copyright 2021 David Allsopp Ltd.                                    *
  9. #*                                                                        *
  10. #*   All rights reserved.  This file is distributed under the terms of    *
  11. #*   the GNU Lesser General Public License version 2.1, with the          *
  12. #*   special exception on linking described in the file LICENSE.          *
  13. #*                                                                        *
  14. #**************************************************************************

  16. set -e

  18. # Hygiene Checks: Ensure that *Labels module docs are in sync with the
  19. # unlabelled version.

  21. MSG='CheckSyncStdlibDocs is a no-op'

  23. tools/sync_stdlib_docs
  24. if git diff --quiet --exit-code; then
  25.   echo -e "$MSG: \e[32mYES\e[0m"
  26. else
  27.   echo -e "$MSG: \e[31mNO\e[0m"
  28.   echo "CheckSyncStdlibDocs: failure with the following differences:"
  29.   git --no-pager diff
  30.   cat<<EOF
  31. ------------------------------------------------------------------------
  32. This should be fixable by just running tools/sync_stdlib_docs and
  33. eviewing the changes it makes.
  34. ------------------------------------------------------------------------
  35. EOF
  36.   git checkout .
  37.   exit 1
  38. fi
